type: Tutorial Step - Let's Mine Some Data!

definition.text: The Run All Project Data Tasks button on the top-right corner of the Data Tasks node menu runs... well... all Project Data Tasks!

paragraphs.text: And that is exactly what we want to do, so...
Select the button on the menu and let's mine!

Confirm the request by clicking the button a second time. In about 30 seconds, you should see a status notice below the Data Mining node indicating that 1 out of 1 Exchange Data Tasks node is running.
Your console app should show something similar to the video on the next step.
